name: Chocolate Italian Cream Cake
author: MARBALET
summary: A chocolaty take on the classic Italian cream cake.
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease and flour three 8-inch round cake pans
Cream 1/2 cup of the butter, shortening and sugar together
Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating after each addition
Stir in 1 teaspoon of the vanilla
Sift soda, flour and 1/4 cup cocoa together
Add alternately with buttermilk to the creamed mixture, beginning and ending with dry ingredients
Stir in the coconut and 1 cup of the chopped pecans
Beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form and fold into the batter
Pour batter into the prepared cake pans
Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 25 to 30 minutes
Let cakes cool completely before frosting between layers and on sides
To Make Frosting: Cream the cream cheese and butter together
Sift confectioner's sugar and  1/4 cup cocoa, beating in a little at a time until well-creamed
Add 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 cup pecans
